mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(SOLD_DETAIL_ID) FROM ( SELECT X.SOLD_HISTORY_ID, X.ACCOUNT_ID, X.ADDRESS, X.RECEIVER_NAME, X.RECEIVER_PHONE, X.ORDER_DATE, X.STATUS, Y.ITEM_ID, Y.SOLD_DETAIL_ID, W.NAME AS ITEM_NAME, W.PRICE, Y.AMOUNT, Z.ITEM_SIZE, Z.COLOR, Y.IS_REFUND, Y.REFUND_STATUS FROM SOLD_HISTORY X LEFT OUTER JOIN SOLD_DETAIL Y ON Y.SOLD_HISTORY_ID = X.SOLD_HISTORY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM_OPTION Z ON Z.ITEM_OPTION_ID = Y.ITEM_OPTION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM W ON Y.ITEM_ID = W.ITEM_ID )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, SOLD_HISTORY_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, ADDRESS, RECEIVER_NAME, RECEIVER_PHONE, ORDER_DATE, STATUS , ITEM_ID, SOLD_DETAIL_ID, NAME AS ITEM_NAME, PRICE, AMOUNT, ITEM_SIZE, COLOR, IS_REFUND, REFUND_STATUS FROM ( SELECT X.SOLD_HISTORY_ID, X.ACCOUNT_ID, X.ADDRESS, X.RECEIVER_NAME, X.RECEIVER_PHONE, X.ORDER_DATE, X.STATUS, Y.ITEM_ID, Y.SOLD_DETAIL_ID, W.NAME, W.PRICE, Y.AMOUNT, Z.ITEM_SIZE, Z.COLOR, Y.IS_REFUND, Y.REFUND_STATUS FROM SOLD_HISTORY X LEFT OUTER JOIN SOLD_DETAIL Y ON Y.SOLD_HISTORY_ID = X.SOLD_HISTORY_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM_OPTION Z ON Z.ITEM_OPTION_ID = Y.ITEM_OPTION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ITEM W ON Y.ITEM_ID = W.ITEM_ID ) ORDER BY ORDER_DATE ASC ) WHERE RNUM >= ((#{Page}*10)-9) AND RNUM <= (#{Page}*10)
